item.title: How do you change the way the npc is facing?
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

[quote=“Paintball199, post:8, topic:169582”]no, Go into your server.java & search for void run. Delete EVERYTHING Whats in there.
now, go into client.java & search for void run & Delete everything Whats in there.
go into autospawn.cfg & delete it. Compile now.[/quote]

Wow I gotta say, dickheads like him should be banned. He deserved that mute.

Even I shame for some of the members here, really nice how everyone helps eachother…

item.title: How do you change the way the npc is facing?
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

no, Go into your server.java & search for void run. Delete EVERYTHING Whats in there.
now, go into client.java & search for void run & Delete everything Whats in there.
go into autospawn.cfg & delete it. Compile now.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the way the npc is facing?

item.title: How do you change the way the npc is facing?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Bluchaos, post:6, topic:169582”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=229270.msg1967181#msg1967181 date=1199147509]
open up client.java, search for “boolean process” without the quotes, then delete 15 lines down from there…save, close your client.java and compile…and it will allow your NPCs to face you want

[/quote]
and how do i make them face any way?
the npc’s can’t just read my mind…[/quote]
you can change the way they face in your npc.cfg…there will the something like NPC = ## (a lot of spaces) Name (a lot of spaces) ### (some more spaces) ###
the ###'s on the very end is which way they face

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the way the npc is facing?
